verbs.description: [ARG1: US steelmaker Nucor] [V: is] [ARG2: the biggest single beneficiary of President Donald Trump 's tariffs] , says " Mad Money " host Jim Cramer .
[ARG1: US steelmaker Nucor is the biggest single beneficiary of President Donald Trump 's tariffs] , [V: says] [ARG0: " Mad Money " host Jim Cramer] .
